mapper.select: select * from member order by idx desc
select * from member where idx=#{ idx }
select * from member where id=#{ id }
mapper.insert: insert into member values(seq_member_idx.nextVal, #{name}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{ip}, #{grade}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, pwd=#{pwd}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address=#{address}, modifydate=sysdate, grade=#{grade} where idx=#{idx}
